p: Chi et al. [ 57] developed the PLA/BEO/nanocomposite films. Briefly, PLA and BEO were dissolved in dichloromethane. Then, 2% nano-TiO 2, and 1% nano-Ag based on PLA dry matter were added into the PLA/BEO dichloromethane solution and the solution was stirred for 10 h at room temperature. Finally, the solutions were poured onto the plate and dried at room temperature.
